text: Marianne Reiter is an Austrian para-alpine skier. She represented Austria at the 1984 Winter Paralympics. She won one gold medal and one silver medal. == Achievements == {| class="wikitable" width=65% style="font-size:90%; text- align:center;" |- !Year !!Competition !!Location !!Position !!Event !!Time |- | rowspan=2 | 1984 | rowspan=2 | 1984 Winter Paralympics | rowspan=2 | Innsbruck, Austria | bgcolor=gold | 1st | Women's Slalom LW2 | 1:29.43 |- | bgcolor=silver | 2nd | Women's Downhill LW2 | 1:18.38 |} == See also == * List of Paralympic medalists in alpine skiing == References == Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Paralympic alpine skiers of Austria Category:Austrian female alpine skiers Category:Alpine skiers at the 1984 Winter Paralympics Category:Medalists at the 1984 Winter Paralympics Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Austria Category:Paralympic gold medalists for Austria Category:Paralympic medalists in alpine skiing Category:Austrian amputees
title: Marianne Reiter
